data.summary: MalariaWorld Mosquito DayMosquito research in Colombia provides valuable insight into effectiveness of malaria control toolsLearn MoreAboutMalaria is a serious disease caused by a parasite that infects a certain type of mosquito.SymptomsMalaria symptoms range from very mild to severe disease and even death.PreventionAvoiding mosquito bites and taking appropriate medications is the best way to prevent malaria.Malaria TopicsClinical FeaturesMalaria infection is caused byPlasmodiumparasite species and can be uncomplicated or severe.Clinical Guidance: Malaria Diagnosis & Treatment in the U.S.Malaria can be a severe, potentially fatal disease, especially when caused byPlasmodium falciparum....Clinical Testing and DiagnosisAlways confirm a clinical diagnosis of malaria with a laboratory test.Choosing a Drug to Prevent MalariaDrugs to prevent malaria differ by country of travel.Malaria Risk Assessment for TravelersThe risk for a traveler contracting malaria differs substantially from region t
